original_text: Gershon's clan had to put up their tents on the west side of the special Tent.
korean_text: 게르손 종족들은 성막 뒤 곧 서쪽에 진을 칠 것이요

sentences.original_text: Gershon's clan had to put up their tents
sentences.korean_translation: 게르손의 가족은 그들의 천막을 치어야 했습니다

sentences.original_text: on the west side of the special Tent
